Chapter Previous Next

class gstBoundingBox

Represents a box aligned with the x, y, and z axis which contains a volume of space.

From header file: gstBoundingBox.h

Constructors and Destructors
gstBoundingBoxFront Right Top corner.
gstBoundingBoxCtor which takes a collection of points and calculates the bounding box.
gstBoundingBox
~gstBoundingBox
Functions
center Returns the position of the center of gstBoundingBox.
getBoundingSphere Returns gstSimpleSphere centered at center of gstBoundingBox and with radius such that gstBoundingBox is just enclosed within the sphere.
getLLBBox Returns new gstBoundingBox set to Left Lower Back quadrant of 'this' gstBoundingBox.
getLLFBox Returns new gstBoundingBox set to Left Lower Front quadrant of 'this' gstBoundingBox.
getLUBBox Returns new gstBoundingBox set to Left Upper Back quadrant of 'this' gstBoundingBox.
getLUFBox Returns new gstBoundingBox set to Left Upper Front quadrant of 'this' gstBoundingBox.
getMaxPt Returns maximum position (right upper front corner).
getMinPt Returns minimum position (left lower back corner).
getRLBBox Returns new gstBoundingBox set to Right Lower Back quadrant of 'this' gstBoundingBox.
getRLFBox Returns new gstBoundingBox set to Right Lower Front quadrant of 'this' gstBoundingBox.
getRUBBox Returns new gstBoundingBox set to Right Upper Back quadrant of 'this' gstBoundingBox.
getRUFBox Returns new gstBoundingBox set to Right Upper Front quadrant of 'this' gstBoundingBox.
inside Tests if pt is inside of box.
leftLowerBackCorner Returns gstPoint coincident with the left lower back corner of this gstBoundingBox.
leftLowerFrontCorner Returns gstPoint coincident with the left lower front corner of this gstBoundingBox.
leftUpperBackCorner Returns gstPoint coincident with the left upper back corner of this gstBoundingBox.
leftUpperFrontCorner Returns gstPoint coincident with the left upper front corner of this gstBoundingBox.
rightLowerBackCorner Returns gstPoint coincident with the right lower back corner of this gstBoundingBox.
rightLowerFrontCorner Returns gstPoint coincident with the right lower front corner of this gstBoundingBox.
rightUpperBackCorner Returns gstPoint coincident with the right upper back corner of this gstBoundingBox.
rightUpperFrontCorner Returns gstPoint coincident with the right upper front corner of this gstBoundingBox.
setMaxPt Sets maximum position (right upper front corner) to newMaxPt.
setMinPt Sets minimum position (left lower back corner) to newMinPt.
getLargestBoundingBox Returns a gstBoundingBox with DBL_MAX side lengths.
Virtual Functions
intersectIntersects gstLineSegment with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectIntersects gstLineSegment with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectIntersects gstRay with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
intersectIntersects gstRay with spatial object and returns gstIntersection::intersectionType which can be;
Enums
